items.title: Episode #2: A conversation with Adam Curry
items.description:
In episode two of On the Dais: Conversations with Councilmember Kelly we hear from the "Podfather" Adam Curry. 

Adam Curry is a podcaster, announcer, internet entrepreneur, and media personality, known for his time on MTV as a VJ. He's also one of the very first celebrities to personally create and administer websites. He is the co-host of the No Agenda show. In the 2000's he started podcasting, which, due to his efforts, got him the nickname "Podfather". We discuss why he left the City of Austin, what Austin could do better, and how he c...
items.feedTitle: On the Dais: Conversations with Councilmember Mackenzie Kelly

items.title: Adam Curry Talks Podcasting 2.0
items.description:
Todd Cochrane Founder of Blubrry Podcasting and Rob Greenlee of Libsyn are joined by the Pod Father Mr Adam Curry for a Podcasting 2.0 discussion and everything podcasting. Please be aware that this show does contain some adult words. We had a great time with Adam and I think this one will go down as … Continue reading Adam Curry Talks Podcasting 2.0 #478 →

items.title: Adam Curry - JML #079
items.description:
Jack Murphy interviews the legendary Adam Curry, aka the "Podfather," co-host of the No Agenda show, former MTV personality, entrepreneur, and Bitcoin maximalist.

They discuss the evolution of the podcasting medium, how Adam is working to transform it with crypto and Web3 integration, how society becomes hypnotized, how to fight back against totalitarianism, and much more.

Adam Curry
Podcast Pioneer & Entrepreneur
Twitter: @ AdamCurry

 

Follow Jack

​Jack Murphy's Book, "Democrat To Deplorable," Now Available On Audiobook:
https://adbl.co/3qXvlEY

Liminal Order:
https://liminal-order.com...

items.title: #09 - Adam Curry: Can't Stop the Signal
items.description:
Today's guest is legendary broadcaster turned podcaster Adam Curry.

Adam has had an extremely rich, unique, and interesting career in media.

What began as pirate radio in Europe during his teens led to becoming a popular MTV VJ as well as several entrepreneurial ventures in the early days of the internet. Later on, he was one of the first to use and popularize the new medium of podcasting, defining in part what podcasting is and how it is best understood.

Since that time, Adam has been a strong advocate for the value for...

items.title: Adam Curry - In Theory - Episode #160
items.description:
Original MTV VJ, announcer, and cohost of the No Agenda podcast, Adam Curry joins Michael this week for a discussion on Michael's pending move to Austin, what Americans get wrong most about their own country, the blue-pilled deflection of labeling something a conspiracy theory by default, the crucial importance of having a discussion about man-made viruses, how to explain the pervasive influence of the CIA to a blue-pilled person, the depths to which the corporate media sank during the Clinton administration, plus Adam's quintessential story about meeting Prince, and so much more!


Get the most...

items.title: 39. Podcasting (ft. Adam Curry)
items.description:
Adam Curry was  a radio broadcaster and talk show host in the Netherlands. In 1987, he became a TV personality on MTV, interviewing about every music star from Madonna to Michael Jackson. Adam Curry founded PodShow in 2005 and is credited with the creation of podcasting as a medium, earning him the name the "Podfather." Adam Curry is also a Dutch knight.

Adam Curry hosts 3 podcasts:

No Agenda

Moe Factz with Adam Curry

Podcasting 2.0

If you would like to donate your research to "The History of..." or send a donation note p...

items.title: Adam Curry | No Agenda, Podcasting 2.0, & The Kraken
items.description:
The Podfather himself, Adam Curry, joins THC to talk about the No Agenda Show, subverting censorship, the madness of our times, & most importantly: Podcasting 2.0.

Not only was Adam at ground zero for podcasting as we know it, but now he's paving the way to decentralize the podcast index, & implement many new features for both podcasters & listeners alike. We will overcome!

Please make sure all your favorite hosts and podcasting apps are aware of the new decentralized, uncorporatized, PodcastIndex.org and think about how you might be able to help make the world of podcasting better.

Check out Adam's trifecta of...

items.title: #210: Adam Curry
items.description:
Join Marty as he sits down with Adam Curry to discuss: 

- Origins of podcasting

- Podcasting 2.0

- Value for Value

- Sphinx chat

- Streaming payments

- Automatic royalties/distributions

- Self censorship and advertising

- Open publishing and distributed money make sense together

- Distrust in media

- much more 

Follow Adam on Twitter

Check out Adam's site

Check out The Podcasting Index + Podcasting 2.0 

Shoutout to this week's sponsors.

...

items.title: Adam Curry on Podcasting with Bitcoin
items.description:
“Paypal de-platform people, MasterCard, which is the processing behind a lot of these systems de-platform people… and the only thing left is Bitcoin.”
— Adam Curry

Location: Squadcast
Date: Tuesday 3rd November
Project: No Agenda Podcast
Role: Co-Host

Adam Curry, along with Dave Winer are credited as the creators of podcasting in the early 2000s. The idea of allowing anyone to broadcast over the internet in an unfiltered and uncensored manner was revolutionary.

For nearly two decades, podcasting has grown into an industry, which Business Insider predicts will be worth $1billion...

items.title: S6 - Episode 1 - A Feature, Not a Bug (With the Podfather, Adam Curry)
items.description: Season 6 picks up right where Season 5 left off, and we'll leave it to Adam Curry to explain the how and why. Yep, that Adam Curry, the former MTV VJ these days known far and wide as the Podfather, a title that's followed him around since one of his inventions -- podcasting -- started to catch on. Not only would Tourette's Podcast not exist without it, but -- wouldn't you know it? -- Tourette Syndrome actually figures into the backstory. Here, Curry opens up like never before in discussing his life with Tourette Syndrome, from his youth, through his early...

items.title: Dr. Steve Pieczenik with Adam Curry
items.description:
Show Notes

Dr. Steve Pieczenik With Adam Curry for December 11th 2019

American Warrior in Crisess

Another mind blowing episode in the 'With Adam Curry' Series

Dr. Steve has written his memoirs in 'American Warrior in Crises' that servees both as a historical document of major events in our lifetime that he had direct involvement in, as well as a guide to creating a Republic that is understood and admired by it's people.

Adam & Steve delve deep into 'Political Psychology'; it's foundation and application.

...

items.title: Adam Curry – The PodFather
items.description:
This guest needs almost no introduction. Without him and Dave Winer, the podcasting space as we know it would not exist. An idea turned into a vision that led to an action that has changed the way millions of people consume media today. This is Adam’s story, as no one else can tell it. He … Continue reading Adam Curry – The PodFather →

The post Adam Curry – The PodFather appeared first on Podcast Legends.

items.title: Bonus – Headbangers Ball with Adam Curry in the Style of Michael Butler, on the Dog Days of Podcasting Day 8
items.description:
今日は何曜日？木曜日 Today is Thursday August 11th 2016, This is host Hinohara Chiaki . This is not the Metal Moment Podcast or the Japanese MetalHead Show. its just another Bonus on the Dog Days Of Podcasting. Today is Day EIGHT, where 18 individuals including myself challenge ourselves to Podcast for 30 Days.

Today I end the RTIC Cooler challenge. I also talk about one of my favorite podcast shows, “No Agenda” hosted by Adam Curry and John C. Dvorak. The evolution of my podcasting Gear, and food.

Purchase your RTIC Products Here

items.title: Adam Curry
items.description: Adam Curry, the "Podfather" himself, is this week's guest!  From pirate radio, to MTV VJ, to co-inventor of modern day podcasting, Curry's broadcasting career has evolved in an incredible arc that currently has him parked in the "Drone Star State." Adam and John C. Dvorak host the No Agenda podcast, which deconstructs current news and media memes. Follow him on Twitter at @adamcurry and subscribe to the No Agenda podcast!

items.title: RickCast no programa do Adam Curry - Daily Source Code
items.description: Ola de novo, Galera! Esse eh o 2o mini-episodio especial do RickCast, onde voces podem ouvir minha participacao no show do Adam Curry, o Daily Source Code. O Adam Curry pra quem nao sabe foi VJ da MTV Americana e radialista durante muitos anos. Ele eh um dos responsaveis pelo surgimento dos podcasts e eh um dos mais ativos promotores do movimento. Entao se quiserem reclamar que eu agora faco um show, reclamem com ele. Esse comentario eh um pouco mais especifico para os podcasters, mas vale a pena ouvir pelo menos um pedacinho. Abracos e inteh mais... Rick...

items.title: 12/15: Multiband compressor, Pell Grant, Adjusted Gross Income, Secret Keyphrase, Mail Bag, Charlie Crowe, i:scintilla, the Adam Curry sound, #138
items.description:
Hey, how does today's show sound? I've been playing with the Apulsoft C3 MultiBand Compressor and a few quick tests gave me more of that Adam Curry sound - let me know what you think!

Student Financial Aid News
+ No new Pell Grant money for you! says US House
+ eCollegeTimes article on avoiding paying student loans
+ Did not mention deferment or forbearance
+ There's always consolidation
+ StudentLoanConsolidator.com or 877-328-1565
+ FAFSA tip on reducing Adjusted Gross Income
+ FAFSAonline.com
+ You have to appear to make less money!
+ Payroll deductions are vital - 401k, IRA, etc.
+ Saving for retirement double bonus
+...

items.title: 12/15: Multiband compressor, Pell Grant, Adjusted Gross Income, Secret Keyphrase, Mail Bag, Charlie Crowe, i:scintilla, the Adam Curry sound, #138
items.description:
Hey, how does today's show sound? I've been playing with the Apulsoft C3 MultiBand Compressor and a few quick tests gave me more of that Adam Curry sound - let me know what you think!

Student Financial Aid News
+ No new Pell Grant money for you! says US House
+ eCollegeTimes article on avoiding paying student loans
+ Did not mention deferment or forbearance
+ There's always consolidation
+ StudentLoanConsolidator.com or 877-328-1565
+ FAFSA tip on reducing Adjusted Gross Income
+ FAFSAonline.com
+ You have to appear to make less money!
+ Payroll deductions are vital - 401k, IRA, etc.
+ Saving for retirement double bonus
+...

items.title: Lifespring!59 Interview With Adam Curry: Our One Year Anniversary and the Podfather Meets the GodCaster!
items.description:
Hosted by Steve Webb Our one year anniversary is finally here! We look back at the past year, hear emails and audio greetings from many different listeners and podcasters, and take a look at what’s ahead for the Lifespring! podcast. Oh, yeah. One more thing…a conversation with Adam Curry! We discuss topics ranging from his...

The post Lifespring!59 Interview With Adam Curry: Our One Year Anniversary and the Podfather Meets the GodCaster! first appeared on Lifespring! Media.
